name: Solid Protocol
description: What is Solid Protocol? All in one decentralized exchange with cross-chain leveraging capabilities, accelerated by Solana. The only DeFi project you will ever need, designed to be a starting point of your crypto journey, and your safe haven. We intend to build a strong foundation based on SOLID as a governance token, with a number of features, including a Trading platform, Swap, built-in bridge, and a whole array of farming options.
